CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests different types of search-and-replace in SourceFrame

Running replace test for /REPLACEME1/REPLACED/  (caseSensitive):
  - // REPLACE#ME1#D#
Running replace test for /REPLACEME2/REPLACED/  (caseSensitive, replaceAll):
  - // REPLACE#ME2 REPLACEME2#D REPLACED#
